item.description:
A hike to the summits of N. & Middle Tripyramids. We ascend via Pine Bend Brook to the summit of N. Tripyramid and then on to the summit of Middle Tripyramid. We descend the same way back to our cars.

Please make sure you have snowshoes and the proper gear. Parking is VERY limited at this trailhead so please make sure to carpool with as many people as possible. Also remember to bring a shovel in case we need to clear some snow away to park our cars.

 

9.6 miles round trip

3400' of vertical gain
item.why: To bag two more winter summits!
item.name: The Tripyramids!
